column2: ENGLISH
You have felt yourself growing weaker. As your skin begins to deteriorate, dark pus starts to ooze from the pox littering your body. You have contracted Pentapox.
column3: Vos ganglions lymphatiques enfl§s sont devenus noirs et ont §clat§, r§pandant § pr§sent du sang et du pus. Vous avez contract§ la peste.
column4: Eure geschwollenen Lymphknoten haben sich schwarz verf§rbt, sind geborsten und es quellen Blut und Eiter daraus hervor. Ihr habt die Pest.
column6: Tus linfas hinchadas se han ennegrecido y estallado, arrojando sangre y pus. Has contra§do la Peste.

column2: Slowly but surely, you have recovered your health. Today you awaken free from blemishes and illness, feeling rejuvenated in body and soul. You have survived Pentapox.
Thank the Spirits!
You feel a sudden onset of weakness, like your body has been drained of all strength. Your coughing grows worse, as does your pain and fever. You have contracted the dreaded Takuan Cough.
Over time, the looming threat of disease has mercifully lifted. As your fever passes, you feel yourself regaining your old strength. You have survived the Takuan Cough.
I hope to never suffer this again!

You feel weak, falling into a deep illness that only brings greater suffering. Worse still, no matter how close you bring yourself to the fire, you feel a chill that pains your body. You have contracted Black Frost.
In time, you start to feel the sunshine on your skin again. The eternal cold that plagued you passes, the pain fades and your strength begins to return. You have survived the Black Frost.
I think I'll stay in the sun a while longer.
A pestilence assaults your mind and body, causing your skin to blister, weep, and your mind to wander into a trance. You sweat endlessly, aching with pain. You have contracted Scorch Blight.

Your malaise slowly begins to fade, and you awaken to just how miraculous your survival truly is. Days pass, and your body slowly begins to heal, but the scars may last forever. You have survived Scorch Blight.
I'm glad to awaken from this nightmare.

At first it starts with a bleeding gash you could mistake for a simple wound. More follow however as your body weakens, and you are overcome with fever. Soon you can no longer feel the blood flowing, just a steady ache. You have contracted Verminbite.
Shedding your bandages, you feel your healed skin, thankful for this moment. With a steady diet, you should regain your strength and leave this terrible chapter behind. You have survived Verminbite.
I could do with something to eat.

Ever since the Comet lit up the sky, thick clouds of ash have sullied your lands. Now, you cannot even draw breath without breaking into fits of coughing. Pain wracks your body every time, and soon you begin to even cough blood. You have contracted Ash Breath.
Miraculously, you overcome the blight that has stricken you. You breath easily again, free to bask in the sun's light free of pain. You have survived Ash Breath.
I breath freely once more.

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] insists upon proper healing, placing you within a tub of water. Slowly, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] bends the water back and forth, light shimmering on its surface. When you emerge, you feel truly rejuvenated.

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] insists upon proper healing, placing you within a tub of water. Slowly, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] bends the water back and forth, light shimmering on its surface. You emerge several hours later, feeling better, but not entirely cured.
Water truly is the element of life.
It is still better than nothing.
I will count upon your skills as a Healer.
§Y[From.GetBestName]§! will perform a healing treatment using Waterbending. The outcome of this treatment can be quite beneficial with little risks.
Raise Shrine

With our accumulated funds and favour with the sages, we can start efforts to raise a shrine to the Spirits. If our efforts please them, it may be that the Spirit we call upon is generous and looks down on us with favour.
In three weeks, we will construct a new shrine to a Spirit of our choosing.

The plans for a new shrine dedicated to the Spirits have been prepared, making use of all the resources at our disposal. One of the most pressing questions remains however, and that is exactly which Spirit this shrine will be dedicated to?
Blessing of the Avatar
To the Avatar, and the Spirit of Order.
Blessing of Hei-Bai
To the great Hei-Bai, Spirit of The Forest.
Blessing of General Old Iron
To General Old Iron, Spirit of War.
Blessing of the Painted Lady
To the Painted Lady, Spirit of the River.
Blessing of Agni
To Agni, almighty Spirit of the Sun.
Blessing of the Kemurikage
To the Kemurikage, Spirits of Vengeance.
Blessing of the Mother
To the Mother of Faces, Spirit of Identity.
Blessing of Tienhai
To Lady Tienhai, the Spirit of Peace.
Blessing of Tui
To Tui, Spirit of the Moon.
Blessing of Yue
To Yue, Spirit of the Moon.
Blessing of La
To La, Spirit of the Ocean.
Blessing of the Spirits
To the Spirits our ancestors respected and communed with.
Legendary
To the Avatar, and the Spirit of Order
To the great Hei-Bai, Spirit of The Forest.
To General Old Iron, Spirit of War.
To the Painted Lady, Spirit of the River.
To Agni, almighty Spirit of the Sun.
To the Kemurikage, Spirits of Vengeance.
To the Mother of Faces, Spirit of Identity
To Lady Tienhai, the Spirit of Peace.
To Tui, Spirit of the Moon.
To Yue, Spirit of the Moon
To the Spirits our ancestors respected and communed with.
To La, Spirit of the Ocean.
§YA chance to invoke the Spirit's blessing, granting increased piety, prestige and command bonuses.§!

After weeks of construction, work on the Shrine has been complete. In raising it, we honour the Spirits, and in particular, we dedicate this shrine to the Avatar Spirit, the legendary protector the world, the Spirit of Order and Light.
May the shrine bring fortune upon us all.

After weeks of construction, work on the Shrine has been complete. In raising it, we honour the Spirits, and in particular, we dedicate this shrine to the Hei-Bai, the Spirit of the Forest. Protective of his lands, we hope that by taking only what we need from the forests, Hei-Bai will spare us his wrath and look upon us favourably.

After weeks of construction, work on the Shrine has been complete. In raising it, we honour the Spirits, and in particular, we dedicate this shrine to the General Old Iron, Spirit of War.  As a Spirit who detests humanity more than any other, let us hope he sees us as just warriors and defenders, not conquerors.

After weeks of construction, work on the Shrine has been complete. In raising it, we honour the Spirits, and in particular, we dedicate this shrine to the Painted Lady, Spirit of the Rivers. By honoring and protecting the sanctity of our lands, we hope the Painted Lady will bless us with good fortune and health.

After weeks of construction, work on the Shrine has been complete. In raising it, we honour the Spirits, and in particular, we dedicate this shrine to Agni, Spirit of the Sun. One of the eldest Spirits, Agni is the giver of life to the world, and the source of Firebending. Let us hope that the Sun Spirit bestows his favour upon us.

After weeks of construction, work on the Shrine has been complete. In raising it, we honour the Spirits, and in particular, we dedicate this shrine to the Kemurikage, Spirits of Vengeance. Just as they once did, we will visit justice upon the tyrannical and the unjust.

After weeks of construction, work on the Shrine has been complete. In raising it, we honour the Spirits, and in particular, we dedicate this shrine to the Mother of Faces, Spirit of Identity. The maker of all beautiful in the world, we hope the Mother will forgive our pride and envy and bless us with good fortunes.

After weeks of construction, work on the Shrine has been complete. In raising it, we honour the Spirits, and in particular, we dedicate this shrine to Lady Tienhai, Spirit of Peace. The great Spirit has long been a protector of mankind, may we hope to honour her sacrifice and prosper in peace.

After weeks of construction, work on the Shrine has been complete. In raising it, we honour the Spirits, and in particular, we dedicate this shrine to Tui, Spirit of the Moon. Forever circling La in the Great Spirit Oasis, if Tui's eternal dance was to ever cease, Waterbending would disappear from the world forever.

After weeks of construction, work on the Shrine has been complete. In raising it, we honour the Spirits, and in particular, we dedicate this shrine to Yue, Spirit of the Moon. The once Princess of the Northern Water Tribe became one with Tui to restore balance to the world and resurrect the Spirit of the Moon. We honour her sacrifice and hope that she will bestow her favour upon us.

After weeks of construction, work on the Shrine has been complete. In raising it, we honour the Spirits, and in particular, we dedicate this shrine to the Spirits mysterious to us, but none the less worthy of our respect. The Spirits roamed this world long before humanity did, and will roam it long after we're gone. May they grant us some of their divine endurance.

After weeks of construction, work on the Shrine has been complete. In raising it, we honour the Spirits, and in particular, we dedicate this shrine to La, Spirit of the Ocean. Forever circling Tui in the Great Spirit Oasis, we hope La is merciful and keeps our ships safe from the great tides and storms.
Shrine of Order
Shrine of Nature
Shrine of War
Shrine of Rivers
Shrine of Agni
Shrine of Vengeance
Shrine of the Mother
Shrine of Peace
Shrine of the Moon
Shrine of the Ocean
Shrine of Yue
Shrine of the Spirits
End the Hundred Year War
For so long have we warred, but the time has come to put an end to this conflict. Without a doubt, we are the supreme power of the world, and the time has come for our enemies to realise that.
As the §YAir Nomads§!, survive and be independent until §Y931 ASC§!\n
As the §YFire Nation§!, have the §YFire Palace§!, the §YEarth Palace§!, §YOmashu§!, the §YNorthern Water Tribe§! and §YSouthern Air Temple§! in your realm.\n
As the §YWater Tribe, have the §YNorthern Water Tribe§!, the §YSouthern Water Tribe§!, the §YEarth Palace§!, the §YFire Capital§! and §YYu Dao§! in your realm.
As the §YEarth Kingdom§!, have the §YEarth Palace§!, §YNorthern Water Tribe§!, the §YFire Palace§!, §YOmashu§!, §YGaoling§! and §YYu Dao§! in your realm.\n
As the §YAvatar§!, be independent until §Y931ASC§!.\n
General of the Army
Admiral of the Navy

Suddenly over the distant horizon, on a normal Winter's day, a pillar of light appears that stretches all the way to the sky, a sight more majestic than anything you have ever seen before. A cool wind seems to sweep through the south, and what this means for the world, you do not know.
Boy in the Iceberg
Girl in the Iceberg
Days like these are strange.
These are strange times, indeed.
The Spirits are sending us a sign!
Finally...
Hey, that's me!
The Avatar's Arrival

Miraculous news has spread through the Temple. [From.GetTitledName], having been thought disappeared almost a century ago, has returned upon [From.GetHerHis] Sky-Bison, not a day older. [From.GetTitledName] is quick to tell tales of having flown into a storm, only to be caught beneath the waves, triggering the Avatar State and freezing [From.GetHerselfHimself] for all this time. Now, at last, the Avatar has returned home with a pair of companions from the Water Tribe.\n\nStill however, the Avatar is disheartened by the passage of time. Everyone [From.GetSheHe] once knew at the temple is long gone. For that reason, the Avatar refuses to stay, insistent on pressing onward to the Northern Water Tribe to begin [From.GetHerHis] Waterbending training.

A hurried messenger brings word from one of our outposts close to the ruins of the old Southern Air Temple. This morning, a patrol not too far from the ruins claimed to have spotted a Flying Bison in the sky. The patrol leader is adamant the sighting is no fiction, having seen illustrations of the supposedly extinct creatures throughout the temple's ruins. Your commanders were split between either dismissing this finding or spreading word until a beam of light suddenly appeared on the horizon, coming from the direction of the fallen Air Temple itself...

A hurried messenger brings word from one of our outposts close to the ruins of the old Southern Air Temple. This morning, a group watchmen claims to have seen a Flying Bison in the skies overhead. Strange, considering such creatures haven?t been seen here ever since the fall of the Air Temple. That, combined with sightings of a Fire Nation warships nearby, has your advisors suggest this may be some kind of prelude to a Firebender attack. You are interrupted however, when a bright beam of light suddenly appears on the horizon, in the direction of the Southern Air Temple itself.
We wish you well in your quest, Avatar.
Is this some kind of trick?
What is this?
The Avatar Returns

Throughout the world, a great change has happened. Countless temples and shrines across the world have lit up in pure white light, shining from the stone images of all Avatars past. Everywhere, all the Sages agree that this sign can mean only one thing: the Avatar has returned after a century missing in parts unknown.\n\nNow the whole world knows of the Avatar's return, one thing is certain. All who thrive in the imbalance and chaos the Avatar's disappearance has caused will try to hunt them down. We can only hope the Avatar succeeds in restoring peace to this war ravaged world.

Throughout the world, a great change has happened. Countless temples and shrines across the world have lit up in pure white light, shining from the stone images of all Avatars past. Everywhere, all the Sages agree that this sign can mean only one thing: the Avatar has returned after a century missing in parts unknown.\n\nNow the whole world knows of the Avatar's return, one thing is certain. This will be a spark that may ignite rebellion across the world against Fire Nation dominance. Soon, action will have to be taken to ensure this pitiful ray of hope for the lesser nations is crushed.

Throughout the world, a great change has happened. Countless temples and shrines across the world have lit up in pure white light, shining from the stone images of all Avatars past. Everywhere, all the Sages agree that this sign can mean only one thing: the Avatar has returned after a century missing in parts unknown.\n\nNow the whole world knows of the Avatar's return, one thing is certain. If the Avatar is to side against the Fire Nation in retribution for their attack on the Air Nomads a century ago, this could be the end of the Fire Nation itself.
Change may indeed be coming...
The Avatar on Kyoshi Island

Early this morning, a group of Kyoshi Warriors brought three outsiders on the island to the village, finding them snooping around. These strange children don't strike you as Fire Nation spies, two obviously being from the Water Tribes further south and another dressed in peculiar, orange robes. When questioned by the Warriors, the orange-dressed [From.GetBoyGirl] claims to be the village's founder, Avatar Kyoshi herself! Despite the Warrior's doubt, the boy quickly proves [From.GetHerHis] claims, bending the air. It is so, that this child, who calls [From.GetHerselfHimself] [From.GetFirstName], is the long lost Avatar, returned at last!
We wish you well on your journey, Avatar.
We must welcome the Avatar with a feast!

Even as the governor of Kyoshi Island, your entire life that you've spent on the island has been pretty uneventful and tiresome. This morning was far from that, however, as news reaches you that a native uprising has begun. This rebellion was spurred on by a visit of three children, one of which claims to be the Avatar [From.GetHerselfHimself]! It awes you that the natives actually believe this, rising up in mass under the banner of their idol, the long dead Avatar Kyoshi. Unless the Firelord sends assistance soon, you're not sure you can deal the sheer number of this rabble?
Send the Messenger-Hawk immediately!

Rumours continue to spread regarding the Avatar's return. Some say that the Avatar has appeared on Kyoshi's Island in the southernmost region of the Earth Kingdom and has continued travelling northward.
That's Interesting if true...

Rumours continue to spread regarding the Avatar's return. Kyoshi Island has risen up in rebellion against its occupiers as word spreads the Avatar has been sighted on the island. Apparently, the Avatar continues northward, spreading the seeds of rebellion.
It'll take more than a single island to change things.

It appears recently that the Avatar has swept through our province, yet another one scarred by the ongoing war. Though [From.GetSheHe] did not stay for long, apparently, this visit has inspired many to join the fight against the Fire Nation.
Good tidings indeed?

It appears that this mythical Avatar has struck again, [From.GetSheHe] and [From.GetHerHis] companions are now inciting rebellion in one of our work camps, causing the Earthbenders to rise up against us! If reinforcements are not sent, this uprising may quickly get out of hand?
Send for reinforcements now!
The Avatar's saved us!
Wretched Spirits.
Our losses have been great...
The North

It appears that shortly after the Avatar reached the North Pole and the stronghold of the Northern Water Tribe, a terrible cosmic terror occurred as the moon in the night's sky ran red with blood. This calamity was apparently caused by an ambitious Fire Nation commander known as Admiral Zhao, who unleashed thoughtless violence upon the great Spirit Tui.\n\nThe combined retribution of the Spirits and the Avatar quickly destroyed Zhao and his army. Somehow, the Avatar was successful in restoring Tui and ended the blood moon. Nevertheless, this event has left the world shaken and terrified of the Spirit's vengeance.
Gaoling
Fall of the Earth Kingdom
The Black Sun
Peace

Not long after the cataclysmic battle in the North the Avatar was spotted again. This time in the city of Gaoling, far in the southern Earth Kingdom. No doubt, the Avatar is now searching for an Earthbending Master, in order to master all four elements.

Word has come that Fire Nation infiltrators have attacked Ba Sing Se with the help of treacherous Dai Li agents. For the first time, Ba Sing Se's walls have fallen, allowing the invading Firebenders to pour into the city. Panicked rumours are swiftly spreading, telling that the Earth King has disappeared and the Avatar has been slain. What is definitely known, however, is that the Earth Kingdom has fallen and the Fire Nation has captured Ba Sing Se.

After being believed dead in the Fall of Ba Sing Se, the Avatar has again returned, this time fighting alongside Water Tribe and Earth Kingdom forces in an attack upon the Fire Nation's capital city. While this attack may be quickly repulsed, it has signaled that the fight is far from over.

It appears at the height of his power, the Firelord has been defeated by the young Avatar. Stripped of his Firebending in a miraculous feat, the Firelord is powerless and thus, unfit for his own throne. Now his once banished son, an ally of the Avatar, Prince Zuko, has ascended the throne.\n\nThe newly crowned Firelord has proclaimed a new era of peace for the Fire Nation, abandoning the Imperialist rule of his predecessors and returning to the old ways. In turn, he has offered a generous peace to his enemies, the return of all conquered territory to the Earth Kingdom.
Hopefully the Avatar will take action soon.
Hopefully, the Avatar will not last much longer.
Curse you, Avatar!
What terrible news!
What a glorious victory for the Fire Nation.
I must flee!
Hopefully, this distracts the Firelord.
The Avatar cannot hope to win.
Peace at last...
How could this be! Such a shameful defeat...
